system.requirements:
Tier 2; WP 30, Resistance (Psychic Powers)
Aptitudes: Willpower, Defence, Tzeentch
system.effect: Character can Reroll failed Willpower Tests to resist Psychic Powers that affect their mind. Psychic powers that have physical effects are unaffected by this talent.

description.value: Character can Reroll failed Willpower Tests to resist Psychic Powers that affect their mind. Psychic powers that have physical effects are unaffected by this talent.
